kickback.translation[0].definitions[0].d: money that someone pays secretly and dishonestly in return for someone’s help
kickback.translation[1].definitions[0].d: money that is paid secretly and dishonestly to obtain someone’s help
kickback.translation[1].definitions[0].e: He is on trial for corruption and allegedlyaccepting kickbacks from businesses.
He and his partner were charged withtaking $300,000 in kickbacks in exchange for their political influence.
